name: redux-saga-requests
description: Redux-Saga addon to simplify AJAX requests
author: Konrad Lisiczynski <klisiczynski@gmail.com>

scripts.test: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs mocha -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill -r chai/register-assert 'src/**/*.spec.js' 'types/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.cover: cross-env BABEL_ENV=coverage nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha -r babel-register -r babel-polyfill -r chai/register-assert 'src/**/*.spec.js'
scripts.build:commonjs: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib --ignore spec.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --ignore spec.js
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development webpack src dist/redux-saga-requests.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production webpack -p src dist/redux-saga-requests.min.js
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
